attributes.action: Remove the wording "Rt Hon" from the title of Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details: As indicated above, the title given is an insult to genuinely honourable people, and, some may argue a form of false advertising.
attributes.background: The title "Rt Hon" should be removed from the official title of Members of Parliament. Having "Rt Hon" is both a complete lie and a disservice to genuinely honourable people.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The term Rt Hon indicates membership of His Majesty's Privy Council, appointment of which is a matter for the Sovereign.
